name: Source of Madness
summary:
Source of Madness is a dark platform shooter game with rogue-like elements. 
We're still working hard on turning this into a full awesome game. 
But already today we'd love to hear your thoughts on our demo! 
 
We have a lot of nice things planned for the full version, such as: 
 
Unique dynamic monsters each play-through 
A rich physics based procedural world 
A lot of spells!
